SuggestionArray.suggestion: Go for a walk until you see a red car.
Go to the store and buy a fruit.
Collect some steps by throughing out the garbage.
Go for a walk until you see a kitten.
Walk back and forth between the bed and bathroom.
Run as fast as you can for 30 sec.
Jump on the spot for 1 minute.
Walk until you say hi to a stranger.
